long_description: Topeak Modula Java cage lets you carry your hot cup of coffee, fitting a range of coffee travel mugs thanks to a sleek, adjustable design. Cage diameter and height adjust simply to fit your coffee travel mug of choice, accommodating 12 oz. or 16 oz. Starbucks(R)-style tumblers. Adjustable rubber strap at top offers a firm fit and helps prevent unintentional spills. Fits travel mugs with a height of 175 - 240mm, lower diameter of 60 - 78mm and an upper diameter of 75 - 90 mm.
short_description: Topeak Modula Java cage lets you carry your hot cup of coffee, fitting a range of coffee travel mugs thanks to a sleek, adjustable design.
